strapiPost.title: NWA Horses Play Unique Role In Healing and Therapy
strapiPost.content:
Horses are incredible creatures and can often play a significant role in emotional and physical healing through different kinds of therapy. 

  • Mental health: Corral Coaching and Counseling of Bentonville offers equine-assisted psychotherapy, and has proudly served the veterans community of NWA. 
  • Physical therapy: Engaging in hippotherapy, the use of horses in physical therapy, Healing by Horseback of Lincoln, serves individuals in speech, physical, and occupational therapy. 

Read more about the amazing power of horses in therapy HERE.
